description:
Slide your bare feet into these and let the felted wool work its magic. Glerups adjust to your foot shape as you wear them for a super-comfortable fit. The wool upper is highly breathable and naturally antimicrobial, so it won't absorb odours or perspiration. A double-thick felted midsole provides plush comfort underfoot, and the durable leather sole is great for around the house or cabin or stepping outside to the woodshed or compost bin.

  • Fleted blend of Danish and New Zealand wool is breathable and naturally antimicrobial
  • Glerups sources wool from suppliers who don't practice mulesing
  • Double-layered felted wool insole is durable and moulds to your foot shape
  • Vegetable-tanned leather soles are suitable for indoor use
  • Slit cuff makes it easy to step in and out of your boots
  • For the best fit, wear your Glerups next to your skin, no socks required
  • Completely handmade
name: Glerups The Boot (Leather Sole) - Unisex
